sentences.en: A spacious Patio and a breakfast room are available for the guests.
sentences.cn: 酒店设有宽敞的露台和早餐室供客人使用.

sentences.en: Dan informed her that he would be out back on the patio cleaning his shoes.
sentences.cn: 丹告诉她说他要去房子后面的露台上擦鞋。

sentences.en: He once said that he fries fish on the patio.
sentences.cn: 而他的母亲,就在自己家的院子里烧菜.

sentences.en: It is. Come on out to the patio.
sentences.cn: 的确如此. 请到院子里来吧.

sentences.en: Let's have lunch out on the patio .
sentences.cn: 咱们在外面平台上吃午饭吧。

sentences.en: Lo ú nico que quiero es que lo tengas encerrado en tu patio.
Mountain biological resources patio set diversity, rarity, originality of one.
sentences.cn: 天井山生物资源集多样性 、 稀有性 、 原始性为一身.

sentences.en: So we turfed the lawn and replaced it with a stone patio.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们用石子代替绿草覆盖草坪.

sentences.en: The patio gave an unimpeded view across the headland to the sea.
sentences.cn: 从阳台望去,视野越过海岬直到大海.

sentences.en: The patio was made of stone slabs.
sentences.cn: 这天井是用石板铺砌而成的.

sentences.en: The piano nobile, the residents'daily domain, is organized around a patio.
sentences.cn: 钢琴钗, 居民的日常生活领域, 是围绕着庭院.

sentences.en: They plink on the pipe and plunk on the patio roof.
sentences.cn: 它们叮叮当当地敲击着排气管,砰然掉落在露台顶上.

sentences.en: They're pretty hard to ignore when you are outside on the patio.
sentences.cn: 当你在外面的庭院的时候你会成为被忽略的目标!

sentences.en: This is the patio, so - called it's really just the back yard.
sentences.cn: 这就是 所谓 的院子 -- 其实只是后院.

sentences.en: We often get complimentary remarks regarding the cleanliness of our patio.
sentences.cn: 我们经常听人称赞我们的露台非常干净。

sentences.en: With a pool and patio outside and a working fireplace and spiral staircases inside, the seven-bedroom house should have buyers lining up.
sentences.cn: 外面有游泳池和院子，里面有壁炉和旋转楼梯，这个拥有七间卧室的房子本来应该有很多买家的。

trans.tran_en: a flat hard area near a house, where people sit outside
